verses.roman:
prabhu lañā vasilā piṇḍāra upare bhakta-gaṇa
piṇḍāra tale vasilā haridāsa sanātana

synonyms: prabhu lañā—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasilā—sat down; piṇḍāra upare—upon the raised platform; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; piṇḍāra tale—below the platform; vasilā—sat down; haridāsa sanātana—Haridāsa Ṭhākura and Sanātana Gosvāmī.
translation: The Lord and His devotees sat on a raised platform, and below that sat Haridāsa Ṭhākura and Sanātana Gosvāmī.
